arts.ttl: Diego Simeone provides double Atlético injury update before Real Madrid & Barcelona

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone focused on Atlético Madrid’s faults after ‘deserved defeat’ to Getafe
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone didn’t look to blame anyone as he spoke following the 2-1 defeat to Getafe, where the Colchoneros surrendered a 1-0 lead in the final minutes after Ángel Correa was sent off. We didn’t play a good game, we had chances at the end, the penalty gave us the chance to take the lead, but Ángel was sent off, maybe it was the right call, maybe not...

arts.ttl: Atlético stunned by Getafe late show in title blow
arts.sum: Getafe's Mauro Arambarri scored a last-gasp quickfire double to upset 10-man Atletico Madrid 2-1 on Sunday as Diego Simeone's side missed a golden opportunity to move top of LaLiga.

arts.ttl: Andrea Berta's transfer history assessed as Arsenal 'reach agreement' for award-winning sporting director
arts.sum: Arsenal and Andrea Berta reportedly reach an agreement for the former Atletico Madrid chief to become the Gunners' new sporting director, replacing Edu.

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone prepared for Julian Alvarez risk against Getafe
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid face a La Liga trip across the capital to take on Getafe tomorrow as the title race tightens up. Los Rojiblancos can edge up to top spot with a win after Barcelona’s weekend clash with Osasuna was postponed. Diego Simeone’s side are just a point behind La Blaugrana in second place – with […] The post Diego Simeone prepared for Julian Alvarez risk against Getafe appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Atlético Madrid name squad for Getafe clash

arts.ttl: Real Madrid suffer huge injury scare ahead of Atletico Madrid second leg
arts.sum: The availability of Antonio Rudiger is a major concern for Real Madrid ahead of their Champions League tie with Atletico.
